item.description:
The Socialist Party of Boston will hold an antiwar action on the next Iraq Moratorium, 16 May. We need to promote vigorous opposition to the war on all levels -- from local demonstrations such as this to the large regional and national demonstrations we have helped organize in the past, and expect to work on in the future as well.

Join us in Copley Square, starting at 5 pm, going until the end. We will stand out with signs and banners for traffic, and engage passersby to keep the war in Iraq an issue, and agitation against it alive.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll make it easier for you this time. Banners, flags and posters will be very visible, and if that still doesn't work, give me a call at 248/303-3785.
item.name: Stand Out Against the Wars
